mapper.sql: us.user_id AS userId, us.user_name AS userName, us.password AS password, us.create_time AS createTime, us.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, us.state AS state
mapper.select: SELECT us.user_id AS userId, us.user_name AS userName, us.password AS password FROM tb_user us WHERE us.user_name=#{userName}

SELECT per.permission_id AS permissionId, per.name AS name, per.en_name AS enName, per.url AS url, per.method AS method FROM tb_user AS us LEFT JOIN tb_user_role AS usr ON us.user_id = usr.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_role AS ro ON ro.role_id = usr.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_role_permission AS rp ON ro.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_permission AS per ON per.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId} HAVING per.permission_id > 0

SELECT ro.role_id AS roleId, ro.parent_id AS parentId, ro.name AS name, ro.en_name AS enName FROM tb_user AS us LEFT JOIN tb_user_role AS usr ON us.user_id = usr.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_role AS ro ON ro.role_id = usr.role_id WHERE us.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT per.permission_id AS permissionId, per.name AS name, per.en_name AS enName, per.url AS url, per.method AS method FROM tb_permission AS per
SELECT role.role_id AS roleId, role.parent_id AS parentId, role.name AS name, role.en_name AS enName FROM tb_role role
SELECT trp.id AS id, trp.role_id AS roleId, trp.permission_id AS permissionId FROM tb_role_permission trp
